# idsec_sia_settings_settings (Data Source)

The SIA ListSettings data source.

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `adb_mfa_caching` (Attributes) The listSettings for ADB MFA caching. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--adb_mfa_caching))
- `certificate_validation` (Attributes) The listSettings for certificate validation. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--certificate_validation))
- `k_8_s_mfa_caching` (Attributes) The listSettings for K8S MFA caching. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--k_8_s_mfa_caching))
- `logon_sequence` (Attributes) The listSettings for logon sequence. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--logon_sequence))
- `rdp_file_transfer` (Attributes) The listSettings for RDP file transfer. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--rdp_file_transfer))
- `rdp_kerberos_auth_mode` (Attributes) The settings for RDP Kerberos auth mode. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--rdp_kerberos_auth_mode))
- `rdp_keyboard_layout` (Attributes) The listSettings for RDP keyboard layout. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--rdp_keyboard_layout))
- `rdp_mfa_caching` (Attributes) The listSettings for RDP MFA caching. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--rdp_mfa_caching))
- `rdp_recording` (Attributes) The listSettings for RDP recording. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--rdp_recording))
- `rdp_token_mfa_caching` (Attributes) The listSettings for RDP token MFA caching. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--rdp_token_mfa_caching))
- `rdp_transcription` (Attributes) The settings for RDP transcription. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--rdp_transcription))
- `self_hosted_pam` (Attributes) The listSettings for PAM Self-Hosted. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--self_hosted_pam))
- `ssh_command_audit` (Attributes) The listSettings for SSH command audit. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--ssh_command_audit))
- `ssh_mfa_caching` (Attributes) The listSettings for SSH MFA caching. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--ssh_mfa_caching))
- `ssh_recording` (Attributes) The settings for SSH recording. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--ssh_recording))
- `standing_access` (Attributes) The listSettings for standing access. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--standing_access))

<a id="nestedatt--adb_mfa_caching"></a>
### Nested Schema for `adb_mfa_caching`

Optional:

- `client_ip_enforced` (Boolean) Indicates whether client IP is enforced for MFA caching.
- `is_mfa_caching_enabled` (Boolean) Indicates whether MFA caching is enabled.
- `key_expiration_time_sec` (Number) The expiration time (in seconds) for the MFA caching key.


<a id="nestedatt--certificate_validation"></a>
### Nested Schema for `certificate_validation`

Optional:

- `enabled` (Boolean) Indicates whether certificate validation is enabled.


<a id="nestedatt--k_8_s_mfa_caching"></a>
### Nested Schema for `k_8_s_mfa_caching`

Optional:

- `client_ip_enforced` (Boolean) Indicates whether client IP is enforced for MFA caching.
- `key_expiration_time_sec` (Number) The expiration time (in seconds) for the MFA caching key.


<a id="nestedatt--logon_sequence"></a>
### Nested Schema for `logon_sequence`

Optional:

- `always_use_sia` (Boolean) Indicates whether to always use SIA for the logon sequence.
- `logon_sequence` (String) The configuration for the tenant logon sequence.


<a id="nestedatt--rdp_file_transfer"></a>
### Nested Schema for `rdp_file_transfer`

Optional:

- `enabled` (Boolean) Indicates whether RDP file transfer is enabled.


<a id="nestedatt--rdp_kerberos_auth_mode"></a>
### Nested Schema for `rdp_kerberos_auth_mode`

Optional:

- `auth_mode` (String) The Kerberos authentication mode for RDP connections (DO_NOT_USE,NEGOTIATE,ENFORCE).


<a id="nestedatt--rdp_keyboard_layout"></a>
### Nested Schema for `rdp_keyboard_layout`

Optional:

- `layout` (String) The keyboard layout for RDP sessions.


<a id="nestedatt--rdp_mfa_caching"></a>
### Nested Schema for `rdp_mfa_caching`

Optional:

- `client_ip_enforced` (Boolean) Indicates whether client IP is enforced for MFA caching.
- `is_mfa_caching_enabled` (Boolean) Indicates whether MFA caching is enabled.
- `key_expiration_time_sec` (Number) The expiration time (in seconds) for the MFA caching key.


<a id="nestedatt--rdp_recording"></a>
### Nested Schema for `rdp_recording`

Optional:

- `enabled` (Boolean) Indicates whether SIA RDP recording is enabled.


<a id="nestedatt--rdp_token_mfa_caching"></a>
### Nested Schema for `rdp_token_mfa_caching`

Optional:

- `client_ip_enforced` (Boolean) Indicates whether client IP is enforced for token MFA caching.
- `is_mfa_caching_enabled` (Boolean) Indicates whether token MFA caching is enabled.
- `key_expiration_time_sec` (Number) The expiration time (in seconds) for the token MFA caching key.


<a id="nestedatt--rdp_transcription"></a>
### Nested Schema for `rdp_transcription`

Optional:

- `enabled` (Boolean) Indicates whether SIA RDP transcription is enabled.


<a id="nestedatt--self_hosted_pam"></a>
### Nested Schema for `self_hosted_pam`

Optional:

- `connector_pool_id` (String) The ID of the connector pool to use for PAM Self-Hosted.
- `is_ip_based_lb_enabled` (Boolean) Indicates whether IP-based load balancing is enabled for PAM Self-Hosted.
- `pvwa_base_url` (String) The base URL of the PVWA for PAM Self-Hosted.
- `service_user_secret_id` (String) The secret ID of the service user for PAM Self-Hosted.
- `tenant_type` (String) The type of tenant for PAM Self-Hosted (PCLOUD,SELF_HOSTED).


<a id="nestedatt--ssh_command_audit"></a>
### Nested Schema for `ssh_command_audit`

Optional:

- `is_command_parsing_for_audit_enabled` (Boolean) Indicates whether command parsing for audit is enabled.
- `shell_prompt_for_audit` (String) The shell prompt used for audit.


<a id="nestedatt--ssh_mfa_caching"></a>
### Nested Schema for `ssh_mfa_caching`

Optional:

- `client_ip_enforced` (Boolean) Indicates whether client IP is enforced for MFA caching.
- `is_mfa_caching_enabled` (Boolean) Indicates whether MFA caching is enabled.
- `key_expiration_time_sec` (Number) The expiration time (in seconds) for the MFA caching key.


<a id="nestedatt--ssh_recording"></a>
### Nested Schema for `ssh_recording`

Optional:

- `enabled` (Boolean) Indicates whether SIA SSH recording is enabled.


<a id="nestedatt--standing_access"></a>
### Nested Schema for `standing_access`

Optional:

- `adb_standing_access_available` (Boolean) Indicates whether ADB standing access is available.
- `fingerprint_validation` (Boolean) Indicates whether fingerprint validation is enabled.
- `rdp_standing_access_available` (Boolean) Indicates whether RDP standing access is available.
- `session_idle_time` (Number) The length of idle time before a session is considered inactive.
- `session_max_duration` (Number) The maximum duration of a session.
- `ssh_standing_access_available` (Boolean) Indicates whether SSH standing access is available.
- `standing_access_available` (Boolean) Indicates whether standing access is available.
